page.title: 15EDUCATION W.GRIMSTEAD SCHOOL
page.content: West Grimstead is a Church of England Controlled Primary School.It has at present 67 pupils, 3 full_time and 1 part_time teachers, a secretary, 2 midday supervisors, a meals helper and a caretaker.There are 8 parent volunteers who spend varying time per week in the school.The old school,now used as a hall, was built in l850 and replaced by a pratten building, which houses Classes 1 and 3 in l960. In l969 a mobile classroom was added and is used by Class 2. In Class 1 there are 26 infants, in Class 2, 8 top infants and 12 first year juniors, in Class 3 21 pupils aged between 9 and 11. 43 (66%) come from Whaddon and Alderbury and 23 (34%) from West Grimstead. There are 34 boys and 33 girls.
